item.title: By: Anirudh Madhavan
item.dc:creator: Anirudh Madhavan
item.description: Well written. I completely agree with whatever you have said. I personally feel that reservation should depend both on economic constrains and social constraints. Economic constraints should be given a higher priority. However, inadvertently, we are going in the opposite direction.
item.content:encoded: Well written. I completely agree with whatever you have said. I personally feel that reservation should depend both on economic constrains and social constraints. Economic constraints should be given a higher priority. However, inadvertently, we are going in the opposite direction.

item.title: By: Easwar
item.dc:creator: Easwar
item.description: Reservations are actually meant for the social upliftment more than financial upliftment. General category are people who are already socially uplifted.<br />Relative poverty is something that will always exist, that cant be eradicated.<br />So reservations shouldn't be given solely on economic reasons.
item.content:encoded:
Reservations are actually meant for the social upliftment more than financial upliftment. General category are people who are already socially uplifted.
Relative poverty is something that will always exist, that cant be eradicated.
So reservations shouldn't be given solely on economic reasons.

item.title: By: raj
item.dc:creator: raj
item.description: well said bro but wat abt a student who is of gc and his parents aren't gradtuates and anuual income is less than 2 lacs. Don't you think such a person would be hard done by even your criteria
item.content:encoded: well said bro but wat abt a student who is of gc and his parents aren't gradtuates and anuual income is less than 2 lacs. Don't you think such a person would be hard done by even your criteria
